attributes.action: Change for kids with mental challenges or disabilities to smoke/vape at school
attributes.additional_details: I believe that children in schools with mental illnesses and or disabilities will be able to function better knowing that they can go for a smoke/vape
attributes.background: Make a new law that states all secondary children with mental a illness and or disability should be allowed to smoke/vape on school premises

rejection.details: It is currently illegal for children under 18 to smoke or vape. If you would like to change this, you could start a petition about that.
